Producer: Elda Ferri, Gabriella Martinelli, Roberto Pace
Production Co: Super Ecran, Harold Greenberg Fund, Capri Films, Astral Films, First Look International, The Movie Network (TMN)
Synopsis: A housewife (Sophia Loren), a famous cellist (Deborah Kara Unger) and a photojournalist (Mira Sorvino) wrestle with painful personal demons.
Title: Between Strangers
